verses.name: Genesis 27:8
verses.text: Now therefore, my son, obey my voice according to that which I command thee.

verses.name: Genesis 27:9
verses.text: Go now to the flock, and fetch me from thence two good kids of the goats; and I will make them savoury meat for thy father, such as he loveth:

verses.name: Genesis 27:10
verses.text: And thou shalt bring it to thy father, that he may eat, and that he may bless thee before his death.

verses.name: Genesis 27:11
verses.text: And Jacob said to Rebekah his mother, Behold, Esau my brother is a hairy man, and I am a smooth man:
